alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 9:53PM MST until December 02 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 10 inches. Locally higher amounts possible on west facing slopes above 9000 feet. * WHERE...Tusas Mountains Including Chama and Chuska Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Some roads may be closed. Significant travel delays are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall may occur in several bursts, the first late tonight through Thursday morning then again Thursday night through Friday morning with potentially another round Friday afternoon and night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama
